diff_act: 1.reserve the amount of resources that will be required by the job on the node.

regen.new_specification: The libra shall notify the system administrator each time the execution host queue status is updated.

regen.absent_element: releasing or reallocating resources upon job completion
regen.new_specification: The libra shall release or reallocate the resources on a node when a job ends and is removed.

regen.absent_element: logging of updates to the execution host queue status
regen.new_specification: The system shall log each update of the execution host queue status for monitoring purposes.

label: After the execution host queue status is updated, the libra shall send the information about the additional load on the queue and node to the central information store.
absence: update status information of the cluster
